title: BRIEF-Cobalt Blue Says Entered Testwork Co-Operation Agreement With Oz Minerals
text:
BRIEF-Cobalt Blue Says Entered Testwork Co-Operation Agreement With Oz Minerals

Commodities 28 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 12:56)

BRIEF-Cobalt Blue Says Entered Testwork Co-Operation Agreement With Oz Minerals Oct 21 (Reuters) - Cobalt Blue Holdings Ltd : * COBALT BLUE HOLDINGS LTD - HAS ENTERED INTO A TESTWORK CO-OPERATION AGREEMENT WITH OZ MINERALS LIMITED * COBALT BLUE HOLDINGS LTD - TESTWORK WILL EVALUATE APPLICATION OF COB TECHNOLOGY TO RECOVER COBALT, COPPER AND GOLD FROM A PYRITE CONCENTRATE

BRIEF-Cobalt Blue Says Entered Testwork Co-Operation Agreement With Oz Minerals
description: BRIEF-Cobalt Blue Says Entered Testwork Co-Operation Agreement With Oz Minerals
